page.title: 04Farming Near Woodthorpe
page.content: Woodthorpe Grange is situated at the top of the bridle path opposite Netherthorpe School. The farm is run by the Broughs and has been there for Three Hundred years. The Broughs own{4 horses and 12000 {poultry housed in 12 poultry sheds.} They grow barley and hay,own{60 acres} {of land and rent 100.} Their machinery consists of{3 tractors,1 combine,1 {fertilizer drill,several harrows.} Each acre of land is worth{Â£2000,} each conbine is worth{Â£20,000}each tractor is worth{Â£10,000}and the poultry sheds are worth the total of {Â£50,000.} Darren Giles is a pupil at Brockley School Shuttlewood and lives on a farm. He says it is hard work,but uncle Brian helps and drives the tractors while mum sows cress.
